skillTree.localised_description: This altar, ridden with disease, is a fitting pulpit from which the Plague Priests preach their words of poison and death.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: As an aid to spellcasting, they are peerless. It is highly dangerous, of course, but a sure-fire route to limitless power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +13
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pestilent Breath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pestilent Breath Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pestilent Breath Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Bless with Filth"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bless with Filth Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Bless with Filth Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wither Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Plague Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Plague Monks
Summons a unit of Plague Monks

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pestilent Birth"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Skaven corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
"Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Sacrifice a weak unit to destroy foes

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

target_if: Not on or below a platform
